articles.title: Changi airport launches baggage tracker for passengers - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): As air travel ramps up around the world, passengers at Changi Airport have been able to track their luggage since the launch of a personalised baggage tracker on Dec 12.

articles.title: Harvey Weinstein found guilty of rape in Los Angeles trial - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The former Hollywood producer was found guilty of rape, forced oral copulation and another sexual misconduct count involving the woman who said he appeared uninvited at her hotel room door during a Los Angeles film festival in 2013.
